articles.description: Reaction as England defend their European title with a dramatic penalty shootout win over Spain in Switzerland.
articles.title: Euro 2025: Reaction as England retain their title with dramatic penalty shootout win over Spain in Switzerland.

articles.description: The next chapter in one of football's most confusing careers is nearly upon us - but will Joao Felix ever fulfil his potential?
articles.title: Joao Felix: Chelsea forward set to join Al-Nassr - so what next?

articles.description: Everything had to be just right for the Lionesses behind the scenes on their way to victory at Euro 2025 - and it was.
articles.title: Lionesses: Lego, lash lifts and Reggie the dog - inside England's Euro 2025 success

articles.description: The defiance shown by Shubman Gill with the bat and in his leadership in the fourth-Test draw against England could be the making of him as India's captain.
articles.title: England v India: Shubman Gill's defiance in fourth Test draw in Manchester could be making of new captain

articles.description: With a hop, skip and a thwack, Chloe Kelly scored the winning penalty in the Euro 2025 final - and changed the landscape of English football.
articles.title: Chloe Kelly: England's Euro 2025 winner is driving change in English football

articles.description: Newcastle have opened talks to sign England and Southampton goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale but discussions remain at an early stage.
articles.title: Aaron Ramsdale: Newcastle United open talks to sign Southampton goalkeeper

articles.description: Physiotherapist Nick Worth tells BBC Sport how Lucy Bronze was able to play through Euro 2025 with a fractured tibia.
articles.title: Lucy Bronze: How did England's Euro 2025 winner play with a fractured leg?

articles.description: Sunderland are set to sign Swiss midfielder Granit Xhaka from Bayer Leverkusen for an initial £13m with a potential £4m due in add-ons.
articles.title: Sunderland transfer news: Black Cats agree £17m deal for Granit Xhaka

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions are on the final stop of their tour of Australia. Keeping them in kit has been a constant juggling act for the team behind the team.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: The logistics of life on the road

articles.description: England goalkeeper Hannah Hampton pays tribute to her grandfather who died two days before the Lionesses' triumphant Euro 2025 campaign.
articles.title: Hannah Hampton: England goalkeeper's tribute to grandfather who died two days before Euros
